required_transport_type.notes: Can use trains for all major connections, optional car for day trips

user_tips: Book Alhambra tickets 2-3 months in advance

itineraries.name: Complete Andalusia Experience - 10 Days

pace_profile.description: Active comprehensive tour with car flexibility

required_transport_type.notes: Rental car essential for white villages and flexibility

user_tips: Rent car after visiting major cities
White villages best in spring for wildflowers
Book paradores early for unique stays

Use car for day trips days 4-5
